long_description: You'll love the cool feel of the women's Marmot Outlook T-Shirt during fast hikes on the trail, runs around the neighborhood or workouts in the gym. Quick-drying, moisture-wicking polyester fabric keeps you dry and comfy and is peached for softness. Fabric helps keep skin safe from harmful UV rays with a UPF rating of 50+. Polyester mesh panels on sides and back of neck increase breathability. Flatlock seams reduce chafing, and tag-free neckline won't irritate skin. Reflective logos enhance visibility in dim light. The women's Marmot Outlook T-Shirt is semifitted. Closeout.
short_description: You'll love the cool feel of the women's Marmot Outlook T-Shirt during fast hikes on the trail, runs around the neighborhood or workouts in the gym.
